data.prayer: Please, teach the 5,248 believers in Amman, Jordan how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Amman, Jordan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Amman to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Amman, Jordan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Amman to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, please remember the Bedouin people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, make bold the prophets in Amman, Jordan so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Amman, Jordan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Amman, Jordan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
